title: Drawing, "Design after 15th Century Monument, Bologna; Verso, Anatomical Study", 1811–14
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed on recto: monumento del quattrocento Bologna.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Double sided sheet from sketchbook. Recto, statues in niches over high dado section, which is under entablature. Inscription: monumento del quattrocento Bologna.  Verso, nude male study, showing head, right half of back, raised right arm, and right leg.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design after 15th Century Monument, Bologna; Verso, Anatomical Study", 1811–14.
1811–14. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1200.
